name: Wake Up! (Akander)
description:
Controls:

A-D to move side to side

Left mouse click: shoot a tear drop upwards

Right mouse click: hit with the club

This is a game we made back in 2015 when we where first year game design students. Only 1 and a half month into game design for a Gamejam hosted at our school. We managed to get Second place in the competition out of around 15 teams.
